# About this guide

This guide provides a technical overview of the technologies and infrastructure behind the MAPS tool to support development of additional features or mirroring of the MAPS tool to internal infrastructure

Complementary guides are provided for the [functionality of the MAPS tool](https://help.micronutrient.support/ "MAPS tool user guide") and [using the MAPS tool within university and professional training](https://learning.micronutrient.support).

Further information on the project and project team which created the MAPS tool can be found at the project website <https://micronutrient.support/>. A summary of our co-design process, implemented to design and test the MAPS tool, can be found at \[![](images/WiP_purplespanner.svg)\].
